summary_of_threads_started_this_week:
Andrea Raspitzu has put forward SCIDADDRESS, an innovative idea for the Lightning Network that aims to simplify the process of sending and receiving payments by using short channel IDs and a channel_announcement to identify a recipient's node-id. This approach is noted for its user-friendly features like reusability and a format that's easy to remember, making it particularly beneficial for mobile wallet users and eliminating the need for running a web server or relying on third-party services. For in-depth information and FAQs, Andrea has provided a link to the full details of SCIDADDRESS: https://gist.github.com/araspitzu/415876f8bffd90a9d7d6b46a41b8914c.

In another development, Vincenzo Palazzo has been working on Lampo, an SDK built upon his experience with lnprototest and the Lightning Development Kit, to facilitate the creation of lightning nodes. The Lampo SDK, now in its public beta version v23.12, has operational commands and is undergoing integration tests with core lightning through lnprototest protocol tests to ensure compatibility. Vincenzo is seeking community feedback on Lampo, acknowledging that while not all feature requests may be accommodated, user input is crucial for its refinement.

The Bitcoin community is engaged in a contentious discourse over amending the consensus rules, with opinions ranging from those who see Bitcoin as immutable "perfect money" to others who would consider changes if backed by esteemed leaders. The idea of emulating the IETF's rough consensus model is being explored, though Bitcoin's lack of structured leadership complicates consensus formation. As 2024 approaches, the challenge lies in how to implement consensus changes, given the division among developers and the controversy over releasing clients to signal support for these changes. Proposals are being discussed for the Bitcoin core project to issue clients with distinct signaling mechanisms and configurations, acknowledging the necessity of such tools for progress and consensus-building in Bitcoin's evolution.
